item.title: Is The "Shower Buddy" From Horrible Bosses 2 A Real Product?
item.description: Kurt, Nick, and Dale's invention in Horrible Bosses 2 called the "Shower Buddy" seems like a product that might actually exist in real life.

item.title: Why General Grievous Has A Cough In Revenge Of The Sith
item.description: One strange detail in Revenge of the Sith is General Grievous' cough, and the old and the new Star Wars timelines each give it a different origin.

item.title: Jurassic World Rebirth's Terrifying New Mutant Dinosaurs Teased By Director
item.description: Director Gareth Edwards and screenwriter David Koepp tease two of the terrifying mutant dinosaurs that will appear in Jurassic World Rebirth.
